name: Something Human
description:
Hey all,

Over the last couple of weeks I've been working on this retro shooter based on Muse's video clip for Something Human. I had this idea and thought it would be fun to develop. This is my first time doing anything like this, and  I have had limited resources (laptop/touchpad and paint), and some aspect could probably do with some fine tuning. Unfortunately I have run out of time to work on it for now, but wanted to get it out there for everyone to enjoy.

I plan on working on it more if people are interested in it. And if there is enough interest, I have some ideas for another game based on The Dark Side. 

I would love to hear what you think of it! 

Enjoy!

Music by Tombofry. You can check out his awesome work here: https://tombofry.co.uk/music
